title: A plant-based alternative to plastic straws | Canadian Geographic
body: Mostly made of plastic, straws are on the chopping block in Canada as the country aims to ban single-use plastics by 2022. While replacements for plastic bags and packaging already exist, the most common alternative to a plastic straw is a paper one, especially in commercial establishments like restaurants.
